You're putting on an act. You keep telling yourself this. This whole thing is like a game. It's not real, but its not fake. It feels like a dream but your completely aware. Everything about this feels strange and unnatural, but yet, you dont stop it. You come close, but yourself or your mother talks you out of it. Why is this? You dont WANT to be your mother, but at the same time, its sort of... interesting. Its not like you were pulled in unwillingly- you had three days to prepare, and did you have any second thoughts then? A couple, but not really. In practice though... its... complicated. As you walk through the living room wearing a skirt and a bra, among other things, you think how wrong this is. You've been trained to think it incredibly embarrassing to wear womens clothes, and in front of your mother, willingly, just doubles it. At the same time, your thinking that its sort of like an experiment. It's not like its a life choice, its not like your enjoying it, and its your mother, the person that knows you better than you know yourself, and its only going to be for a couple days. It will be fun. And yet, at the same time, and this is the thought that is really bothering you, your starting to WANT to where a cute outfit and look good and care for a family.

You realize that A) everything is new and its fine to think so much, even though you should probably cool down on it and B) there are no absolutes. You arent suddenly going to think you're your mom, or become youself again by all mean, at least you hope you wont and C) Everything will be fine. Just chill out, and play the part. If its so bad, you'll never have to think about it ever again, and the only people who will know is you and your mom.

" I'm good! Hey! Did I tell you about Alex in my class?!"
"Uh, no, you didnt!" Your cousin LOVED to tell boring, terrible stories about her 6 year old life, and everybody usually humored her, even though they were completely disinterested, so you humored her.
"Well, so, theres this girl Alex in my class, well actually theres two Alex', but one of them is a boy, and the boy Alex broke his arm and had to get a cast, and yesterday we all singed it, and I singed it "Dear Alex, Poop" Hahaha."
"Oh, hehe..."
"And so the girl Alex, she came to school in her tap shoes, shes a dancer, not like the ballet kind, but she does taps, and she came to school in her tap shoes, and they were making a bunch of noise going CLIP CLAP CLIP CLAP every time she walked, and it was funny!"

You look over to your mother, who is trying to hold back a great laugh, and not having very much luck, you roll your eyes at her. Becca is still going on, as you cut in.
"Th-Thats great honey, now can I speak to your mom?"
"Yeah, she's right here."
You let out a small sigh of relief as Becca passes the pone over. you hear on the other end "Who is it? Aunt Sheila? Okay, give me- no, give me the phone."

"Hello?" You hear a much more mature feminine voice. Showtime.
"Hey Sis."

"Yeah"

“Sorry big bro’, they just showed a marathon on TV last night.”

Once again, you and Taylor go in on direction while Veronica and Crystal head in the opposite way.

You head down one way and are spotted by a security guard making his rounds. He calls in on his walkie-talkie, “Perps in sector 5-5! I repeat, perps in sector 5-5!”

“Aw! Frickin’ ‘A’!” you cry and make a dash in the other direction with Taylor close behind.

“We’re doing an awful lot of running today!” complains Taylor. “I don’t think I’ve EVER run this much in my life!”

Taking a sharp corner, you both duck into another store that sells sporting goods. You both ditch your pink and black dresses, which were borrowed from the other store, and change into some tight leotards and pose next to some mannequins displayed in the window.

Other members of the mall patrol and the policemen join the head security guard. They look around and head off aimlessly in two different directions.

“I can’t believe this actually worked,” you say adjusting the leopard-printed leotard you’re wearing.

“Of course, why wouldn’t it work? It does for Scooby-“

“DON’T YOU DARE MAKE ANOTHER SCOOBY-DOO REFERENCE!” You threaten your sister pointing your slender painted index finger at her.

She sticks her tongue out at you in reciprocation.

Suddenly you hear voices cry out, “There they are! Are you guys stupid? How could you miss them?”

“Aw, crap!” you cry as the two of you exit the sporting good shop and more running ensues…
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Split up again and keep searching.

choices: Risk leaving the store as you are.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
After managing to give your pursuers the slip yet again by ducking into a hardware store, looking very much out of place in your leotards, gym socks and sneakers, you are scared half to death when Veronica pops up behind you out of nowhere.

"HOLY FRICKING CRAP!"...you cried out, almost jumping out of 'Taylor's skin'.

"Where the hell did you come from?"...you ask Veronica, putting your hand in between your breasts.

"I created a new tracking device!"...she beamed, holding up the new device and ignoring your initial question.

"What do you mean you created one, have you got a mobile workshop in your shorts are something?" you reply, somewhat puzzled.

"Oh who cares as long as it helps us find the crystal" Taylor interjected, periodically peeping out of the store to check if the police were coming.

"Er...no,"...Veronica corrected Taylor, ..."this will help us find the first tracking device" she said.

Getting two blank stares in reponse, Veronica just held up up her hairy male arms and shrugged: "What?"

"Wouldn't it have been quicker to just create a device to find the crystal?" Taylor questioned, a growing frown appearing on her face.

"Yeah, making a tracking device to find a tracking device seems a bit stupid"...you added.

"Well...that would be...er...a little more difficult, and I wasn't sure I could do it, but if I can find the first detector then I know for sure that I could find the crystal"...she stuttered, not quite sure herself.

"Right!"...Taylor muttered, rolling her eyes.

"Look, just shut up and lets go" Veronica told you both, as she gestured towards the door.

"We can't go out there yet, the police are all over us, we need another change of clothes" you informed Veronica, who rubbed her double chin and thought for a second.

She then suggested that she go and get the two of you some different clothes, so that mall security and the police wouldn't recognize you.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Veronica creates a tracker for the tracker

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
“So let me get this straight, you built a tracking device to track the first tracking device to track the crystal we need to power the first body part swapping device because the second one practically disintegrated, right?” you reconfirm. You use Taylor’s index and thumb to pinch the bridge of your nose as you close your eyes hard trying to comprehend what needs to be done.

“In the first place, yes to what you just said. Why do you keep repeating the plot? Second – what on earth are you and Taylor wearing? Doing a little workout I see,” jokes Veronica. You get a little nervous as you swear you see the bulge in Veronica’s pants get bigger after looking at the two of you clad in tight-fitting leotards and sneakers.

“I think you two could really use a change of clothes,” advises Veronica.

“I have to agree with her,” confirms Crystal, “You guys stick out like a sore thumb.”

“You guys remain hidden. I’ll attempt to gather some new apparel for you so you’re less conspicuous.” With that, Veronica leaves.

Taylor looks down at herself wearing the bright pink leotard. “Julie really has a nice body, doesn’t she? I don’t think I ever want to give it up!”

“What?” you utter. However looking down at your body, realistically Taylor’s, in the spotted leotard, you sort of share the mutual feeling about not really wanting to give up the body your currently have.

After about 10 minutes Veronica comes back with an armful of clothes. “I didn’t have much time to think. I just grabbed whatever I could conveniently obtain and returned back here before I was discovered.”

The three of you rifle through the pile of clothes and you sigh. You snap at Veronica while giving her an evil glare, ”You know for a brilliant scientist, you sure lack some common sense. You really expect us to dress in this?”
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Go with Veronica's plan.

choices: Check that you've shaken off security first.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
You look at the outfit Veronica had got for you to wear and you can't believe what you're seeing: "Did you raid a foreign clothing store to get these things or what?" you asked her, as you look at the dark-colored jersey with lace trim, the detailed mesh skirt, a sequin pashmina for around your neck, black pantyhose and a pair of peep-toe platform shoes.

"We're not attending a swanky dinner party in Dubai you know" ...you frowned, feeling the material of the jersey you now had to put on.

Nevertheless, not wanting to run around in a leotard and sneakers anymore, you took all the clothes and ran across to the gents toilets across the way to get changed.

"Pssst!,"...Taylor suddenly called you quietly, ..."maybe you should go in the other one" she suggested, pointing to the ladies toilets.

You looked down at Taylor's 14-year old body under your head and bit your lower lip before looking back at her:
"Yeah, maybe you're right" you muttered back, before disappearing into the toilets.
--

Meanwhile, Taylor held up the black satin blouse, the lurex pinstripe pants and the silver glitter sling-back sandals that Veronica had handed to her to get changed into.

"These clothes are crap! And the shoes don't even go with the pants or the blouse, you've really got no fashion sense at all you know, you should stick to building weird contraptions if I were you"...Taylor rattled on, before following you into the toilets.
--

Five minutes later the two of you emerged wearing your new outfits, and neither of you were impressed, the only thing you liked were your black open-toe pumps.

"Right, now if we can get on with finding the detector with the detector" Veronica sighed, before frowning to herself realizing what she had just said.

"See...sounds stupid don't it?" Taylor smiled, putting her hand on Julie's hip.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Clothes option #1

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
You leave the bathroom and look down at yourself to see the ensemble you’re wearing. You look back and forth at everyone’s attire. “How come I couldn’t wear the pants?” you grumble.

“Because it won’t fit Taylor’s teenage body! Now shut up and let’s go. Next time YOU can run out and steal clothes for everyone, thank you very much,” Veronica snaps in a bitter tone.

“Look at what I’m wearing!” you sigh, “This won’t hide us! It’ll draw more attention to ourselves!”

“No. Let’s think about this logically – Question: What is security looking for? Answer: They are looking for two perpetrators who have stolen a pink and a black dress. Also they’re looking for two people dressed in leotards,” deduces Veronica.

“But this?” you sputter ready to chuck the salmon colored scarf wrapped off of your neck. “It’s like Taylor and I are going to the prom or dancing or bad prostitutes, or something! It’s like we’re way overdressed for the mall!”

“If you act suspicious and shady, you’ll be more noticeable,” continues Veronica.

“Hmm…” you must be tired because that sort of made sense.

“Also put these on,” Veronica instructs as she found some wigs to put on Taylor’s and your heads.

“What about you two? The cops know what you both look like as well!” you say pointing to Veronica and Crystal.

“I’ve already taken that into consideration.” She herself changed clothes into a baggy T-shirt that highlighted her male pecs and biceps, a pair of slacks, some loafers, and a baseball cap to shield her face.

Crystal puts on a wig and dresses in a similar ensemble to yours but in red and white.

“This is all a bad dream I know it. Freud must be having a field day with me right now in his grave…” you say rubbing the temples of your head and your eyes closed.

Veronica finally turns on the device - There’s a lot of static and there’s a loud intermittent pinging sound like a sonar machine.

“My God, that’s kind of noisy! Didn’t you think of making some sort of readout for a flashing light or directional thing instead of it like a Geiger counter?” complains Taylor.

“Oh I’m sorry, let’s use YOUR tracking device. Well go ahead - pull it out. Oh looks like you don’t have one, do you now? Look, it’s the best I could do combining the resources I had on such short notice, so shut up!” she snaps in a sarcastic tone.

Veronica rotates her body to face the device all around. When the pinging pulsed faster and louder, she signaled over to you all to follow her…
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Start tracking the first detector.

choices: Split up and create a diversion.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
"Alright, turn that off, it sounds like an 80's arcade game, I've already got a headache"...you complained to Veronica, who just ignored you and continued pointing her tracking device in every direction.

"VERONICA! Turn it off!"...you repeated.

"She probably can't hear you over there in Mission Control"...Taylor frowned, as the device started beeping louder and making a noise like an electronic teletype.

"Moon calling Veronica, come in please!"...you tried again, trying to remain calm.

Suddenly the machine made one continuous beep like a flatline on an electrocardiogram as Veronica pointed it towards a large clothing store across the way.

"HEY DON'T IGNORE ME!"...you suddenly screamed at her, making her jump, the detector then fell out of her hand and smashed on the floor.
--

With Taylor and Crystal looking on, Veronica turned to you...rage painted all over her face.
"DO YOU HAVE ANY IDEA HOW DIFFICULT IT WAS FOR ME TO MAKE THAT THING YOU UNGRATEFUL, SARCASTIC LITTLE CRETIN!"...she ranted.

"Keep your voice down!"...you responded, looking around nervously.

"KEEP MY VOICE DOWN??"...Veronica shouted at you, putting her large hands on her male hips.
She then growled at you and turned away from you so she could calm down a little, and Taylor and Crystal both walked up behind you, their heels clicking on the tiled mall floor.

"Nice going bro! Not even Shaggy and Scooby could have messed up like that"...Taylor muttered quietly.

For a moment you thought about berating Taylor for mentioning Scooby Doo again, but instead you just let your head drop in dejection as you let out a sigh.
--

As Veronica was picking up the pieces of the detector, Crystal suddenly saw the two swapped agents from earlier, one with the lower half of an 8-year old girl, and the other with the lower body of the girl's mother in high heels.
Two other agents were accompanying them this time and they were both over 6' tall.

"Er...guys! I think we got company" Crystal said to you all.

"Oh give me a fricking break!"...you sighed, as you drew Veronica's attention to the four agents.

"What do we do?" Taylor asked, as you all looked across at the agents, who hadn't yet seen the four of you.

"Crap our pants?"...you shrugged in reply.

"I think I've already done that!"...Veronica suddenly stated, surprising you all, ..."you don't know how cruel these government guys are when they want to be"...she continued, lowering her baseball cap further.

"Well the detector had tracked the first detector to that store over there before you broke it"...Veronica told you, pointing to the clothing store off to your left.

"What do you mean before I broke it? You dropped it!"...you argued.

"Yes but who screamed in my ear and nearly gave me a heart attack? YOU DID!"...Veronica snapped.

"Alright you two, knock it off, Sean....it was you that broke the device" Crystal interjected, ending the argument in Veronica's favor.

A satisfied smile appeared on Veronica's face, which you could just see under her cap.

"Whatever!" you muttered, sounding like a sulking child.

Suddenly the four agents moved position...and stood in front of the clothing store that you now had to go into, asking random people if they had seen any of you.

"What were the chances they'd stand there?" Taylor groaned, as she gestured to the four agents.

"Going on our luck recently...pretty good actually!"...you replied.

The four of you now had a choice to make....
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Run into the agents again

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
“The only logical thing to do,” begins Veronica, “Is to split up and create a diversion!”

“Right… and I just bet I know WHO’S going to have to create the diversion…” you say in a rather flat tone.

“Sean and Taylor, you guys are the most agile, so we need you to lure those four agents away from the door so Crystal and I can sneak in to the building and find the tracking device.”

“Who didn’t see this coming?” you moan.

“More running?” whines Taylor. “I don’t want to. I’m tired already…”

“Would you do it for a Scooby-snack?” you ask.

“What?”

“Nothing… just forget it,” you dismiss not wanting to admit that you just made a Scooby-Doo reference.

“C’mon, kid! We’re all in this together! You guys can do it!” reassures Crystal.

You sigh then lean over and whisper to Taylor what needs to be done, “mutter mutter mutter… Got it?”

“Well, actually no... You just whispered in my ear ‘mutter mutter mutter.’”

“Just follow my lead!” you say exasperatedly.

You and Taylor walk past the agents. “Yoo hoo! Oh, fellas!” you cry waving to the four agents in front of the clothing store. Then you pull off your wig, “Looking for me?!” You turn on your heels and start running.

Two of the agents chase after you and your sister.

“That was it?! That was your grand plan?” screams Taylor.

“Shut up! I didn’t hear you come up with any brilliant ideas!” you retort. You look over your shoulder, “Dammit! Only two of them are chasing us! We need to split up and you need to get the other two agents away from the door!”

“How the heck am I supposed to do that?”

“You’re resourceful, Taylor! You’ll think of something!” Upon saying that, you turn at the next corner and separate resulting in…
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Split up and create a diversion.

choices: Taylor OR Crystal creates the diversion.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
"Aww crap!" you exclaimed after parting company with Taylor...and noticing that only one of the agents had followed you and not both of them.

"NICE PLAN BRO, TOO BAD IT SUCKED!"...Taylor shouted to you, as you ran in opposite directions, each of you chased by a 6' tall, muscle-bound government agent.

Bolting up an escalator, you look back and see the agent still on your tail, you push several people aside and tip a flowerpot over at the top of the escalator in an attempt to slow the man down, then you dash into a DVD store and push over a display stand full of James Bond movies before running out of the back exit.
--

You run in and out of another three stores, knocking over several more items...and people, before finally shaking off the agent by ducking into a small photography studio.

After watching the agent run past, you then left the studio and headed back to the clothing store, where you hoped Taylor would have the good sense to come back to once she had shaken off the agent pursuing her.
Veronica and Crystal were still waiting outside, sat on a bench facing away from the two agents who had been swapped with the 8-year old girl and her mother from the waist down.

"What happened?"...Crystal inquired, with a frown on her face.

"Our plan didn't go according to plan?" you say in between deep breaths.

"Jeez that's a shocker!" Veronica muttered sarcastically, as she adjusted her baseball cap again.

"Where's Taylor?"....Crystal then asked you.

"I don't know,"...was your reply, ..."hopefully she's lost that agent who was chasing her and she should be back here soon"
--

"Oh, speak of the devil" Veronica then said, gesturing to Taylor, who was walking up behind you, out of breath and holding the heel off her left shoe, which had snapped off during the chase.

"You okay sis?" you asked her.

"Yeah cool bro, I'm loving this, in fact...I can't get enough of it, lets get chased some more...please!" your sister replied sardonically, wiping the sweat from her brow.

"Point taken" you sighed, turning to Veronica again.

"Right, you've lost those two agents for the time being, now what about those two?" she said, pointing over to the two swapped agents.

"Looks like another diversion is in order" you mumbled, rubbing your chin with your sister's delicate fingers.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Only one agent follows you

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
“C’mon, Taylor! Let’s get them to chase us one more time!” you urge your exhausted sister.

Taylor shoots you and evil glare and flicks you off.

“I think I can distract them, sugar,” volunteers Crystal.

“No, I think we’re going to need two people to distract them,” you surmise.

“I agree with Sean,” nods Veronica, “You’ve seen what happened last time.”

Crystal drop the bag full of tools and equipment and Taylor lugs it over her shoulder.

“Okay, you ready?” you ask Crystal.

“Sure thing, kid,” she winks at you.

You both run around the other end and surprise the two agents swapped form the waist down with the 8-year-old girl and mothers’ legs.

“Hey! Remember me? I managed to lose those other guys! If I could shake them, then that means your agency SUCKS! HA!” You taunt them.

“Ha! I bet I could sneak past you guys!” adds in Crystal.

You both run in opposite directions closely tailed by one agent apiece. This gives Taylor & Veronica the perfect opportunity to sneak in a hunt for the crystal.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Taylor OR Crystal creates the diversion.

choices: She refuses to hand it over.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
Veronica and Taylor headed for the store and were just about to enter it when Julie came barging out and literally bumped into the two of them.

"Ooops, sorry I didn't mean to...oh its you two" Julie started apologizing, before stopping herself.

"Jeez, nice to see you too Julie" Taylor scowled, who still had Julie's body under her head.

"What the hell is that thing?"...Veronica suddenly asked, pointing to the device in Julie's right hand, a device that looked familiar to her. Before Julie could respond however, Veronica recognized the device:

"OH MY GOD! That's one of the prototype P06X detectors, where did you get that?"...Veronica asked Julie in a shocked tone of voice.

"Oh er...I found it" Julie lied, rather unconvincingly.

"We didn't just fall off a turnip truck you know, where did you get it" Veronica said disdainfully, as she folded her arms and waited for Julie to tell her the truth.

"Okay fine, I bumped into an old classmate from school, he er...he's working for the government now, he gave me it and told me all about the devices, he said they would be safer if they were in government control"

"I guess you just fell off the damn turnip truck if you believed that"...Taylor suddenly muttered to Julie, as she dropped the bag of tools onto the floor.

"Taylor's right,"...Veronica stated, ..."those agents will tell you anything in order to get what they want, and do you seriously believe the government can be trusted with the devices?" she asked Julie, who was holding up the detector she was holding and inspecting it.

"The devices certainly aren't safe in untrained hands, look at the chaos Sean and Taylor have caused ever since they came into possession of theirs" Julie argued, earning a glare from Taylor.

Veronica then noticed that Julie's other hand was clenched tight around something else:
"And WHAT are you hiding in your other hand?"...she inquired, pointing to Julie's left hand.

"The crystal!"...Julie responded, realizing that lying wouldn't help matters.

Veronica held her large male hand out and politely asked Julie to hand it over.....
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Something else

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
Julie turns back, “No, it’s mine! I found it!”

“Julie, don’t be an idiot! Don’t you want your body back?”

“Now why would I want to do that, Vernie?”

“Wait a minute… ‘Vernie?’ There’s only one other person who called me that! BETTY! IS THAT YOU?!”

“Sure is. You know for someone as smart as you are, it sure took long enough,” She says tossing the crystal up and down. “Fortunately you guys created enough of a diversion that I could sneak in and use the P06X detector to find me the crystal. It’s pretty big, I don’t know how we missed it,” says Betty in Julie’s body.

“C’mon, sis’. A gadget can be hidden in many places on a person’s body. I hid mine in my back molar. It’s a body-switching ray than had only a one time use.”

Both Betty and Veronica shoot Taylor and evil glare.

--

Meanwhile the two agents you thought you lost earlier has rejoined the other one who swapped from the waist down. They’re closing in on you as you run as fast as you can with Taylor’s body.

They all lunge for you and one grabs your jersey, another grabs your mesh skirt, and the last agent grabs your sequin pashmina around your neck:

RRRRRRRIIIIIIIIIIIIIPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!

“OH SHIT!” you cry!

You now have your male head on Taylor’s body wearing only a pair of black bra and panties, black thigh high pantyhose and a pair of peep-toe platform shoes! You flee in fear and embarrassment while dozens of shoppers wonder what the hell is going on.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: She refuses to hand it over.

choices: Find some clothes then rescue Julie.
Find some clothes and go after Betty.
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
Reacting quickly, you tipped over a nearby gobstopper machine and the glass casing smashed, sending the round candy all over the floor, the three agents...and a few other people all fell onto their asses as you ran off back towards the clothing store...in only your black bra and panties, stockings and high heels.

The agents managed to scramble to their feet but they were unable to catch up with you, especially the one swapped from the waist down with an 8-year old girl.
--

Back at the clothing store, Betty (in Julie's college girl body) was just turning to bolt from Taylor and her confused sister Veronica when you accidentally barged right into her...sending the crystal and the prototype detector flying out of her dainty hands.

As you both picked yourself up off the floor, Taylor scrambled to get the crystal, leaving Veronica to try and retrieve the detector that Betty had used to find the crystal.

"NOOOO!" Betty screamed, as she focused on Taylor...who now had the crystal in her possession.

Figuring out she would be in trouble if the three of you got the device working, Betty quickly took flight, leaving you VERY confused:

"Why did Julie take off like that?" you asked Veronica and your sister.

"You're kidding right??" you mumbled in a shocked tone of voice.

Taylor just shook her head at you and sighed as Veronica got the device out and started installing the crystal in order to power it up.

"Don't worry, we're gonna set things right" Veronica said positively, as she flicked a switch, the device suddenly jumped into life, it was now in perfect working order again...sort of.

"Is that thing functioning again? you asked, trying to comprehend all what had happened.

"Yes, fully functional!" Veronica beamed back at you.

"Then lets go find that bitch!" you said angrily, forgetting for the moment that you were only wearing underwear, a fact that Taylor reminded you of when she herself noticed.

"WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO YOUR CLOTHES?" she suddenly screamed, ..."you can't flash my body off like that, even though it is gorgeous" she said modestly.

"Oh crap! Okay...first I'm gonna get some clothes, then we're going to find Betty" you said, trying to cover yourself up with your arms the best you could, you could sense people staring at you.

"What about Julie?" Taylor asked, ..."she's where Betty was, with that damn Mannequin's body and that bitch's fat head on its shoulders"

As Crystal arrived back on the scene, Veronica filled her in on what had happened, and upon seeing the distress on Crystal's face when she learned of Julie's situation...you knew you had to make your decision quickly.

“There’s no time!” you exclaim. Thinking fast you take the device from Veronica and zap yourself…

BBBZZAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!!!!!!!!

You switch Veronica and your bodies:

So Veronica has her head on Taylor’s body only dressed in her heels, bra, and panties while your head is on some random man’s body wearing a T-shirt, lacks, and loafers.

As much as you didn’t want to give up Taylor’s body, this body would be faster and you’d be able to put up a fight versus Taylor’s teenage female frame.

Veronica is not pleased as she covers herself with her arms and yelps.

Taylor’s not too pleased to see Veronica’s large head on her half-naked body.

You race after Betty, still in Julie’s body, and find her taunting Julie stuck with Betty’s head and the mannequin body in front of the statue.

“How the heck do I do this?” you think to yourself taking aim with the device. “This thing swaps only body parts, not switches brains… or does it? I guess the brain is body part – right?”
1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.title: Find some clothes and go after Betty.

1512322111111212112111112112111222211222.content:
Not realizing you had the device the wrong way around, you fired it hoping for the best:

BBBRRRRZZZZZZZZZZAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!!!

Having being blinded by an intense flash, you are shocked to find yourself standing beside Julie, who still had Betty's chubby head and was still attached to the mannequin's body. However, your head was now on the college girl's body that Julie/Betty had previously possessed.

You looked over at Betty, who still had her brain in Julie's pretty head, but she now had the random man's body from the neck down, which meant she was stronger. She also had the device...which she was holding in her hand.

"HA HA! I've got you now!" Betty grinned wickedly, as she raised the device and fired...without turning it round the right way first.

BBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRZZZZZZZZZZAAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPP!!!

Another flash of light...and Betty's head (really Julie's) was now back on the mannequin....and Julie's head (really Betty's) was on the man's body holding the device.

"Wow! Talk about shooting yourself in the foot!" you muttered, as you started feeling the curvy female body your head was now affixed to.

"NNNNNNNNNNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!" a distraught and angry Betty shouted, as she found herself unable to move again.

Julie then took a chance and aimed the device at the top of Betty's (her own) head and fired it...this time pointing it the right way, and only after you had moved to a position behind her.

To Julie's relief...her and Betty's brains were swapped back over and she had her own head back, although she now had a man's hairy body from the neck down.

"Hmmm, better than having a plastic body I suppose" Julie shrugged, before turning to you and thanking you for rescuing her...sort of.

Taylor (with Julie's body) and Veronica (with Taylor's body dressed only in underwear and heels) then showed up on the scene to see what had happened, Taylor was barefoot because she had ditched her silver pumps due to the heel mishap she had while being chased earlier.

They also saw that Julie now had the man's body and you had the college girl's body Julie had previously.

Not liking the image of Veronica's head on your sister's body...you aimed the device and fired again without warning them first, aiming at head level.

BBBBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!

Veronica and Taylor instantly swapped heads, which meant that your sister now had her own body back at last, unfortunately she didn't have much clothing to go with it.

"Hey is it me or is that thing getting more accurate" Taylor muttered in disbelief, as she tried covering herself up with her arms.

Meanwhile, Veronica's head was now on Julie's shapely body and she seemed to be quite impressed with it.

Unfortunately for her you didn't give her the change to enjoy it:

BBBBBBBBRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRZZZZZZZZZZZZZZAAAAAAAAAAAAPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!!

15233.content:
On the computer in your room, the neon-flashing text box appears: Tutorial!!!. Feeling rather impatient at the moment, you are in no way interested in reading a lengthy piece of startup material. In fact, the website itself seemed rather... off. There were no advertisements, no publisher information, no toolbars at the top except for the Tutorial, SwapMe logo, and the URL.

You yawned, listening to the soft hum of the computer. Through the blinds of the window next to you, there are a few kids playing basketball on a driveway adjacent to your house, as well as a young couple walking with their dog. The afternoon sun was already preparing its descent into the horizon. All seemed right with the world... except for that piece of paper.

That piece of paper. You found it in that dusty box, in the attic. It looked like it hadn't been touched for years... just laying there. Could it have been there before your family moved in? You shake off that thought; a website link from the past seemed too anachronistic to get carried away with.


Yet... the handwriting on the paper looked like a carbon-copy of Dad's writing. It was hard to place your finger on exactly what made it seem familar. The letters melded together like cursive, but it was written in print-- just like Dad's sloppy writing style. The paper, ripped from a lined notebook, was partially-yellowed with age. Indeed, all that was written was "SwapMe.com-- I could swap any physical trait I wanted. Now it's your turn."

A rapping of knuckles sounded against your bedroom door.

"Sean, Mom wants you down here now." Taylor shouted through the door. "You have to finish writing your thank-you cards."

"Okay sis, be down in a minute." You stuff the paper into your pocket and leave the box next to the computer, along with the website left on....

152331.content:
You hurry downstairs to meet your mother in the kitchen. She was busy preparing dinner for the night, her back turned attending to the stove.

"Your friends and family were pret-ty nice to you this year." She spoke casually. "I bet they would really appreciate it if you wrote them a thank you card. Hand written... you know those are the most sincere ones."

You sigh. "Alright mom, I get it. But to be fair, I only have a couple more left." She replies, "I know that sweetie, but it's been nearly a week, and I want to have the last of them mailed by tomorrow. Can't send them on Sunday." She stated matter-of-factly.

"Who's left?"

"Your Aunt Debbie, and Keith, and Grampa Jake" She pointed to an unfinished pile of letters, stamps, and opened birthday cards. "The rest are taken care of."

You grumble. Birthday cards are fine and everything, especially the ones with money and other stuff like that. As you grab a pen and begin crafting a letter, you remember the scrap of paper wedged in your front pocket.

"Mom, do you know anything about a website called SwapMe.com?"

She turns to get a few spices from the pantry. "Can't say that I have... why?"

"Oh, nothing." muttering, you add, "just that I found it in a dusty old box in the attic. The paper seems too old to belong in anything from this millenium, yet it describes a website."

"Maybe Taylor's playing a prank on you?" She suggested innocently. "Do you mind setting the table? Dinner will be ready soon."
